text: ryy muoy puokke niyeay tha ke( mou ham meat) ban bradit nouv peakyaphoutkohk towleu a l laoh ryy? dau che neah brasenbae a l laoh mean chetnea trong nung baohtra phchit leu chetd robsa anak( aoy phe l ch kompir kuor- an) cheaminkhan . haey a l laoh bambatchaol nouv ampeu min troem trauv haey trong banhcheak nouv karpit tamory peakyasaamdei robsa trong ( kompir kuor an) . pitabrakd nasa trong mha doeng nouv avei del mean nowknong chetd
